title: DSA - Stories

home.text: Write anonymously your revelation and we will be publish it on the FB Group: “DSA - Ein online Jahrbuch”! Read more in the “About” section of this page.

about.title: About
about.text: This page was created in order for you to be able to share anonymously with the alumni, ex students and professors of DSA anything about the school you would never share on a facebook group using your real name. The only thing you have to do is write a secret, an “embarrassing” story, a revelation or anything else you can think of and we will publish it on the facebook group “DSA - Ein online Jahrbuch”. If you never reveal your name on the text you submit there is no way for us to know your identity, so your anonymity is secure. Of course anything you submit has to comply with the rules of the group.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: The administrators keep the right not to publish anything they think that violates the rules.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.text: This website uses third-party software and cookies to collect anonymous data in order to monitor the usage. We have no way to link any data you provide to you or any other physical person. For further information contact the admins here.
